body:
## Bevy version

0.16.0

## What you did

I am experimenting with using `bevy_ecs` without the rest of Bevy. I added a dependency equivalent to:

```toml
[dependencies]
bevy_ecs = { version = "0.16.0", default-features = false, features = ["multi_threaded"] }
```

More minimally, you can get the same result with

```toml
bevy_tasks = { version = "0.16.0", default-features = false, features = ["multi_threaded"] }
```

## What went wrong

`bevy_tasks` does not compile:

```
error[E0277]: `*const ()` cannot be shared between threads safely
   --> /Users/kpreid/.cargo/registry/src/index.crates.io-1949cf8c6b5b557f/bevy_tasks-0.16.0/src/task_pool.rs:483:61

483 |                 let _result = AssertUnwindSafe(executor.run(tick_forever))
    |                                                         --- ^^^^^^^^^^^^ `*const ()` cannot be shared between threads safely
    |                                                         |
    |                                                         required by a bound introduced by this call
    |
    = help: within `ThreadExecutorTicker<'scope, '_>`, the trait `Sync` is not implemented for `*const ()`
note: required because it appears within the type `PhantomData<*const ()>`
   --> /Users/kpreid/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-aarch64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/marker.rs:778:12

note: required because it appears within the type `ThreadExecutorTicker<'scope, '_>`

96  | pub struct ThreadExecutorTicker<'task, 'ticker> {

note: required because it's used within this `async` block

    |                                    ^^^^^
note: required by a bound in `edge_executor::Executor::<'a, C>::run`

    |

    |                       ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ has type `&executor::LocalExecutor<'static>` which is not `Send`, because `executor::LocalExecutor<'static>` is not `Sync`

```

Instead, it should compile successfully, or perhaps report a `compile_error!()` about how my feature configuration has to change.

## Additional information

It compiles if I *add* the `async_executor` feature.

```toml
bevy_tasks = { version = "0.16.0", default-features = false, features = ["multi_threaded", "async_executor"] }
```
